description: Two panel huipil with round-cut neck opening; red ground with purple, white, blue weft stripes; supplemental weft patterning of zoomorphic figures, primarily birds; embroidery around the neck, weaver's name embroidered at lower edge.
markings: \'MARIA CHAVEZ\', in purple silk, at bottom proper R side
medium: Cotton, silk; supplementary weft patterning, embroidery
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
